trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_001<tab>Haven't seen you around before... Ahem. If you've yet to speak to Searchingway, I suggest you rectify that posthaste.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_002<tab>Welcome to the interplanetary research station, where we analyze exploration data and develop new tools for the betterment of the initiative.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_003<tab>If you would like to take part in our research, it's simple: complete stellar missions to fill up your dataset, then report back.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_004<tab>Our cosmic tools are still prototypes for now, but the more data you bring in for analysis, the more we'll be able to improve them.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_100_005<tab>Check your exotablet─all the details are there!
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_100_006<tab>You may now participate in cosmic research. Progress is displayed on your exotablet under Cosmic Research.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_100_007<tab>For more detailed information, check the Exploration Guide.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_005<tab>Welcome to the interplanetary research station! I'd be happy to help you with data reporting, cosmic tools, or whatever else you may need.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_A1_000_001<tab>Report research data.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_A1_000_002<tab>Inquire about cosmic tools.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_A1_000_003<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_A1_000_004<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Which research would you like to report?
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_006<tab>I'm afraid we've finished work on that dataset. Have you considered broadening your horizons?
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_007<tab>You can do better than that, surely? Go and complete more stellar missions. I can't work with anything less than a full dataset.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_014<tab>...And before you say “that's too vague,” all the exact figures you could want are right there on your exotablet.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_015<tab>I realize it's a lot of work, but just think of what you'll gain in return: my boundless appreciation! And a cosmic tool, I suppose.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_EXCHANGE_CONFIRM_CHECKBOX<tab>Report research data.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>Unable to obtain item. Insufficient inventory space.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_100_007<tab>Your <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8020202 /var>? I'll need to wait until you've finished using it.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>Unable to complete trade. The selected gear is currently equipped.

TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_008<tab>With your help, the <var 28 ((WKSCosmoToolName)) E80201 /var> is now complete!
Oh! Right. <var 1A 02 /var>Ahem<var 1A 01 /var>... And be sure to try out your newly enhanced cosmic tool!
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_009<tab>Not to interrupt your report, but with all the data you've gathered, we may be on the cusp of a breakthrough...
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_CONTINUE_UPDATE_CONFIRM_CHECKBOX<tab>Continue reporting research data?

TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_010<tab>With your help, we've officially reached a new stage of research, and you know what that means: we're in need of all-new data! Check your exotablet for the details.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Your current research level has earned you a new cosmic tool. Which would you like to receive?
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_013<tab>Keep in mind that this tool reflects the current stage of our research. I eagerly await your next report!
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_011<tab>Ahem! You already have that one, remember?
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_RESEARCHINGWAY_000_012<tab>If you want a cosmic tool, you'll need to bring me data, and lots of it. Your exotablet has all the relevant details.
TEXT_CTSWKSSDGATTENDANT_00920_CLASS_NAME<tab><var 2B ((<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E80201 /var>)) /var>.
